text:
@Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Every day closer to November is a day the nation looks forward to removing this toxic Trump admin whose failures led to 106,000+ dead Americans and a shattered economy.

Trump mobilized troops to harass peaceful protests faster than fighting covid19.
